com.axelor.studio.service.wkf

Class WkfTransitionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.axelor.studio.service.wkf.WkfTransitionService

  •  class WkfTransitionService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class handle processing of WkfTransition. It creates buttons and actions from WkfTransition to change the status.
    Author:
    axelor

    • Constructor Detail

      • WkfTransitionService

    • Method Detail

      • process

        protected void process()
        Root method to access the service. Method call different method to process transition. Create wkf action that call on save of model to update status. It save all changes to ViewEditor linked with Workflow.

      • proccessTransitions

        private java.util.List<com.axelor.meta.schema.actions.ActionRecord.RecordField> proccessTransitions()
        Method process each WkfTransition and create RecordField. RecordField contains status and condition to assign the status. Based on record fields onSave action will be created. It also add button for transition if transition executed based on button.
        Returns:
        List of RecordField

      • addButton

        private void addButton(ViewEditor viewEditor,
             WkfTransition transition,
             java.lang.String condition,
             java.lang.Integer sequence)
        Create toolbar ViewButton in ViewEditor from WkfTransition. Method called if WkfTransition is based on button.
        Parameters:
        viewEditor - ViewEditor to update.
        transition - WkfTransition to process.
        condition - Condition to show button
        sequence - Sequence of button to add in toolbar.

      • addButtonActions

        public void addButtonActions(ViewButton viewButton,
                    WkfTransition transition,
                    java.lang.String buttonName)
        Method create action for button from WkfTransition and related destination nodes. It set onClick of ViewButton with new action created.
        Parameters:
        viewButton - ViewButton to update for onClick.
        transition - WkfTransition from where action created.
        buttonName - Name of button used in creation of action name.

      • getActionRecordXML

        private java.lang.String getActionRecordXML(java.lang.String name,
                                  java.util.List<com.axelor.meta.schema.actions.ActionRecord.RecordField> fields)
        Method create ActionRecord from given name and list of RecordField. It generate xml from ActionRecord.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of action.
        fields - List of ActionRecord.
        Returns:
        Xml of ActionRecord created.

      • getActionValidateXML

        private java.lang.String getActionValidateXML(java.lang.String name,
                                    java.lang.String type,
                                    java.lang.String message)
        Method create ActionValidate from given name,type and validation message.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of action
        type - Type of validate action ('notify','info' or 'alert').
        message - Message to display for action.
        Returns:
        Xml generated from ActionValidate.

      • updateMetaAction

        public void updateMetaAction(java.lang.String actionName,
                    java.lang.String actionType,
                    java.lang.String xml)
        Update xml of MetaAction with xml string passed. It creates new MetaAction if no MetaAction not found.
        Parameters:
        actionName - Name of MetaAction to update.
        actionType - Type of MetaAction.
        xml - Xml to update in MetaAction.

      • addButtonPermissions

        public void addButtonPermissions(java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String buttonName,
                        java.util.Set<com.axelor.auth.db.Role> roles)
        Create/Update MetaPermission for button and set this permission in roles.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of permission to create/update.
        buttonName - Name of button to add permission.
        roles - Roles to update with permission.

      • clearOldMetaPermissions

        public void clearOldMetaPermissions(java.lang.String name)
        Clear old button permission from all roles having it.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of permission to clear.
